ccs.aco.editor

Interface MiniEditor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TestEditorV2

    public interface MiniEditor
    This interface defines all the functions that is done by the text editor independent of the buffer
    Author:
    royd1990

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void editorCopy()
      This method is used for copy operation as demanded by the user of the editor
      void editorCut()
      This method is used for cut operation as demanded by the user of the editor
      void editorEndRecording()
      This method is used in version 2 of the text editor to stop recording of all the commands provided by the user
      void editorInsert(java.lang.String substring)
      This method inserts the string inserted by the user
      void editorPaste()
      This method is used for paster operation as demanded by the user of the editor
      void editorPlayRecording()
      This method is used in version 2 of the text editor to play recording of all the commands provided by the user
      void editorRedo()
      This method is used in Version 3 of the text editor for the redo operation
      void editorSelect(int start, int stop)
      This method selects the string from start and stop position inserted by the user
      void editorStartRecording()
      This method is used in version 2 of the text editor to start recording of all the commands provided by the user
      void editorUndo()
      This method is used in Version 3 of the text editor for the undo operation
      java.lang.String getBuffer()
      This method returns the buffer string
      java.lang.String getClipboard()
      This method returns the Clipboard string
      java.lang.String getSelection()
      This method returns the selection string
